page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: The road ways in the D-Block have greatly improved since the A174 was built.This road net work dominates the block.The A174 is a dual carriageway which connects minor towns and places like Eston and Lazenby.The majority of people use a car or bus.A few young people and a lot of old people have bus passes or fare savers.A lot of people say that a buspass or fare saver can save a lot of money for the people who regularly travel to work by bus.The main buses used are 263 and the 274.A lot of people go shopping,to ASDA on the Asda bus,a free service supplied by Asda,the main supermarket close to the area.The residents of the Almshouses are particularly grateful for the free bus passes.
